Description.Text: The complex covers 12.000 square meters of which almost two thirds have been dedicated to pools, terraces and gardens. The result is a hotel allowing guests to have access to the extensive open areas within its grounds. Indoor Swimming Pool: You will find the heated pool, Including a Jacuzzi where the water temperature reaches 30 and finally, what better than relaxing in the sauna. GYM:This hotel offers it s clients at no extra cost, magnificent modern gym facilities equipped with the latest technology with everything necessary in order to stay in shape. Solarium: Situated nest to the plaza del mar and in the centre of the complex you Hill find the outdoor swimming pool with a total water surface of here, you can relax on the fantastic water seats you can also participate in all the water related activities with the entertainment team. Furthermore for the family there is the splash pool where the youngsters can enjoy themselves, under the supervision of the lifeguards. Zone Infantile: With families and children in mind, they have created a specific area for games, where the young ones will find slides, basket, ball games, swings etc. All of this complying with the highest levels of safety including a rubber floor to avoid any incidents.

This hotel is situated in a privileged area know as Ciudad Jardin of Sierra Nevada which is part of the exclusive residential zone of Benidorm. It is situated 900 metres from the Levante Beach, just in front of the Benidorm Palace and just 250 metres from famous Aqualandia and Mundomar Theme Parks.

This hotel has 176 rooms, all of which are exterior and with terrace/balcony. Equipped with direct dial telephone, internet access, electronic doors locks, mini bar used of fridge, central heating, air conditioning full bathroom, hair dryer, music, satellite colour television, and safe. Our bedrooms have been designed with the most exquisite comfort criterion, spaciousness in mind. All rooms have a capacity for up to 4 people and 12 of them are interconnected.
Modern architecture building and all the rooms with balconies.

Restaurant Riu-Rau: The hotels restaurant allows guests to choose from a complete and varied menu. Combining both international cuisine and the well know Mediterranean diet. Our restaurant also offers a varied selection of wines from the best know regions of our country. In the restaurant you can also enjoy watching our chef creating the most exquisite dishes on the show cooking. Mare Nostrum: The general purpose lounge is totally equipped giving you more than 600m2 of facilities to celebrate banquets, weddings conferences conventions and business meetings, with the latest technology thanks to the moveable partitions we are able to create 4 independent sound proof lounge in which to hold seminars, conferences and business meetings. At night time, part of this modern working area transforms and is converted into an entertainment lounge where the evening is accompanied by orchestra and various live shows. If you prefer to celebrate a special event in the outdoors la plaza del mar is the ideal place to enjoy the cosy atmosphere whilst taking in the Mediterranean architecture of our hotel. Sal n Cafeter a La Naia This cosy lounge offers a 600m2 meeting place for the hotels guests, here you will find a bar reading area, games internet access and T.V. area. Here, every day of the year you can enjoy our entertainment which includes shows, live music, activities for the little ones etc.
Large in size and modern decorated.
